job.title: Software Engineer, New Grad
job.description: Level makes benefits as simple as paying with cash starting with insurance To make this possible were rebuilding every part of benefits so everyone wins Employers can offer bigger benefits for far less members get more freedom and choice and providers are paid instantlybrbrAt our core Level is a fintech company with a diverse team from industryleading companies like Square Oscar Uber and ZocDoc Were backed by Khosla Ventures Lightspeed Ventures First Round Homebrew BoxGroup and Precursor Ventures Dental and vision is just the start Theres so much more to come in helping employers and their teams get more from their benefit dollars through fast flexible spendingbrbrstrongWhat Youll Do brstrongulliLearn how to design thoughtful APIs that enable members employers and dentists to interact with Level in realtimeliliWork on building the data model our platform will use to organize information about members dentists and employersliliBuild features for our web and mobile applications so members can easily understand their benefits and access careliliHelp launch additional product lines by collaborating with the product design actuarial sales and operations teamsbrliulstrongWho You ArebrstrongulliCompleted computer science projects before and are comfortable discussing themliliBA or BS in Engineering Math Computer Science or related fieldliliExperience with one serverside language Go Java Python etc or clientside language Android iOS React Ember Angular Vue Javascript Typescript Swift ObjectiveC Java Kotlin etcliliAbility to multitask in a constantly changing environment Context switching across multiple product lines liliSelf driven with a mindset towards taking action brliulstrongWhat We Offer brstrongulliHave the chance to work at a leading innovator and trailblazer in the world of insurance and paymentsliliCompetitive salary and equitylili100 paid medical for you and 80 for your dependents 100 covered dental and vision through Level for you and your dependentsliliFlexible vacation policy  take the time you need when you need itliliFully Paid Parental leave for 3 monthsliliQuarterly Company sponsored eventsliliInternal learning and development programsbrliulLevel is proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer We celebrate diversity and are committed to creating a welcoming and inclusive environment for all Please apply to this role if you feel you are a good fit regardless of your race color religion gender identity sex sexual preference sexual identity pregnancy national origin ancestry citizenship age marital status physical disability mental disability medical condition military status or any other perceived limiting factor We welcome applicants from all walks of lifebrbrEVerify Program
